title: Ride or Die
description: Ride or Die, the ultimate bond, the unconditional act of being there for someone, no questions asked, having someone’s back no matter if they fail or succeed. Is it possible? Is it plausible? What if the person becomes unrecognizable, or you feel yourself die in the process? Is there an invisible fine line, and if so, where do you draw it?BrookeHawk is unlike anyone I’ve ever dated. For one, he’s a biker, a member of the Gates of Hell MC...but I don’t care.HawkThe women around me know how to handle it, handle me. Brooke is different, and I think that is what draws me to her.
author: Lily Wallis
